scripts.build: rimraf build && mkdir build && symlink-dir assets build/assets & tstl
scripts.package:win-mac-web: pnpm run build && cpy ./makelove.win-mac-web.toml ./build --rename=makelove.toml && cd build && makelove
scripts.package:linux: pnpm run build && cpy ./makelove.linux.toml ./build --rename=makelove.toml && cd build && makelove
